summary: REQ-1/REQ-2/REQ-3 appear implemented via updated copy in HeroSection and ServicesSection. GitHub icon/link removal in ContactSection is implied by the react-icons import change and the updated component summary, but the relevant JSX is truncated so it can’t be fully verified from the snippet. The diff also includes unrequested HeroSection visual/styling changes and updates to project metadata/summary files beyond the requested copy/link removal.

hallucinated_features.description: Hero section styling/visual changes beyond copy update (e.g., multiple new/different dark overlay layers and related comments about increased darkening).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly say not to change styling/layout/animations beyond what’s required to update specified text and remove the GitHub link; these additional overlay layers are unrelated to the copy-only requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to project metadata/summary files (e.g., project_state.json and frontend-file-summaries.txt) not requested by the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requirements only mention updating specific component copy and removing the GitHub link; no requirement to update documentation/summary state files was provided.
